articles.title: Fabrício Almeida-Silva
articles.contents:
Fabricio Almeida-Silva
          
          
          Home
          Blog
          
          
          
          
          
          
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Fabrício Almeida-Silva
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        Twitter
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        GitHub

            About me
            I am a computational biologist interested in using and developing algorithms to study the evolution of plant genomes and gene networks.
            
            
            Education
            MSc. Plant Biotechnology | Universidade Estadual do Norte Fluminense Darcy Ribeiro, in progress
            Biological Sciences | Universidade Estadual do Norte Fluminense Darcy Ribeiro, 2019
            
            
            Publications
            Almeida-Silva, F., Moharana, K. C., & Venancio, T. M. (2021). The state of the art in soybean transcriptomics resources and gene coexpression networks. in silico Plants. https://doi.org/10.1093/insilicoplants/diab005
            Sangi, S., Araújo, P. M., Coelho, F. S., Gazara, R. K., Almeida-Silva, F., Venancio, T. M., & Grativol, C. (2021). Genome-Wide Analysis of the COBRA-Like Gene Family Supports Gene Expansion through Whole-Genome Duplication in Soybean (Glycine max). Plants, 10(1), 167. https://doi.org/10.3390/plants10010167
            Almeida-Silva, F., Moharana, K. C., Machado, F. B., & Venancio, T. M. (2020). Exploring the complexity of soybean (Glycine max) transcriptional regulation using global gene co-expression networks. Planta, 252(6), 1-12. https://doi.org/10.1007/s00425-020-03499-8
            Machado, F.B., Moharana, K.C., Almeida‐Silva, F., Gazara, R.K., Pedrosa‐Silva, F., Coelho, F.S., Grativol, C. and Venancio, T.M. (2020), Systematic analysis of 1298 RNA‐Seq samples and construction of a comprehensive soybean (Glycine max) expression atlas. Plant J, 103: 1894-1909. https://doi.org/10.1111/tpj.14850
